manifest.install: CREATE TABLE `ims_aj_conste` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) NOT NULL, `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `thumb` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `copyright` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `copyrighturl` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `qrcode` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `instruction` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `bgpic` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;
